did.unittitle: Photographic portrait composite of Major-General Simon Bolivar Buckner and his Camp Boone staff

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Salt print. Includes portraits of Col. Rank Tryon-Assistant Quartermaster General, Assistant Commissary-General; Col. Ben Hardin Helm- Assistant Inspector-General, Assistant Adjutant-General; Col. Isaac W. Scott, Assistant Surgeon-General; Col. Ben Hardin Helm- Assistant Inspector-General, Assistant Adjutant-General; Col. Chas D. Pennebaker, Assistant Paymaster General; Major-General, S. B. Buckner, Inspector General, and Commander of Kentucky State Guard; Col. Samuel Gill, Chief Engineer; Major James A. Beattie, Judge-Advocate; Capt. Philip Bacaro, Captain in the Subsistence Department; Rev. Jas. Craik, D.D., Chaplain
